con:restRequest.name: postBalanceFromRsdk
con:restRequest.con:request: <?xml version="1.0"?> <ns2:Balances xmlns:ns2="http://schema.medfusion.com/statements/v1"> <BalanceMessageHeaders> <Sender VendorName="Meridian Medical Management" DeviceLocalTime="2016-07-19T12:45:12-04:00" DeviceVersion="8.2" DeviceName="VertexDR" /> </BalanceMessageHeaders> <Balance id="${generatePayloadRandomData#id}"> <BalanceAccountNumber>${generatePayloadRandomData#balanceAccountNumber}</BalanceAccountNumber> <OutstandingPatientBalance>${generatePayloadRandomData#outstandingPatientBalance}</OutstandingPatientBalance> <OutstandingInsuranceBalance>${generatePayloadRandomData#outstandingInsuranceBalance}</OutstandingInsuranceBalance> <BalanceDate>${generatePayloadRandomData#balanceDate}T00:00:00</BalanceDate> <BalanceDueDate>${generatePayloadRandomData#balanceDueDate}T00:00:00</BalanceDueDate> <TransactionId>${generatePayloadRandomData#transactionId}</TransactionId> <PatientDemographics> <PatientIdentifier> <PracticePatientId>${#Project#patientExternalId}</PracticePatientId> <!-- <MedfusionMemberId>${#Project#patientMemberId}</MedfusionMemberId>--> </PatientIdentifier> <Name> <FirstName>${#Project#firstName}</FirstName> <MiddleName></MiddleName> <LastName>${#Project#lastName}</LastName> </Name> </PatientDemographics> </Balance> </ns2:Balances>
